The "TT img enc" is used online to get around the RH platform's sensitive content moderation system. If you're using this workflow locally, you can ignore this group.

**How to use "TT img enc" online:**
1.  After running the workflow, it will generate a grayscale image. Save this image to any folder on your local computer.
2.  Download [TT_lmg_Loc.v1.1.exe](https://github.com/liangtongt/TT-tools/releases/tag/1.1) from GitHub to your computer. Then, just drag and drop the saved grayscale image onto `TT_lmg_Loc.v1.1.exe`, and it will decode it into a video or image.
If you are running it locally, you can directly use this workgroup. When running the workflow online, please use the "TT img enc" workgroup
